meanings.definition: A physical altercation between two or more individuals using only their fists.
meanings.sent1: The two boys had a fistfight after school.
meanings.sent2: The fistfight broke out in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent3: During the fistfight, they both ended up with sore knuckles.
meanings.sent4: Their argument turned into a fistfight, fists flying in the air.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fistfight echoed through the empty street.

meanings.definition: To engage in a physical fight using only one's fists.
meanings.sent1: He decided to fistfight back when pushed against the wall.
meanings.sent2: They fistfight whenever they disagree on something.
meanings.sent3: She playfully challenged him to fistfight for the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The two rivals fistfight for the title of champion.
meanings.sent5: In the movie, the hero must fistfight the villain to save the day.
